html: 9.3.16  10:52 pm   You answered people's question ' when's the next 5 min video?' with 'now' - but there's no new video on YT or your site.. Are you Trolling or are you just saying you're Working on the next 5+ min video now? Hope you're well

9.3.16  1:06 pm   for your songs I'd imagine you'd use different keys in the middle of the same song. But when you're just on your keyboard to play, do you find yourself just feeling out a certain key to its most potential for feels sake. For example, I defaultly just play/feel Eb major and just play the notes and chords in that scale all day cuz I canz bruh. Can you get distracted by one key if you play it long enough to not recognize the potential in others, and do you fin yourself in that situation sometimes?

9.2.16  7:59 pm   the songs i wrote during my early teens were a lot more ambitious despite having wrong chords and other amateurish mistakes. the songs i write nowadays, even though much better mix/mastered, seem to lack that ambitious quality. i feel like i'm playing it too safe every time i compose something now. how do i turn back into a kid again?
